name: Fnf Battle:Rap Dance
description:
The game is mainly based on three characters, boyfriend and tankame,witty's whose ultimate goal is dance and rap of the night. But for this, the lover has to impress the father by playing music. The game will ask you to press the button at the right time. This game shows you when and which key to press. Time and accuracy are important elements for scoring points in this game.
Friday high effort has good graphics and for the most part, it is a simple and addictive game mechanic that is very easy to control and easy to use. When in doubt, there are tutorials and two modes of play: one free where you have patience and one storytelling until you can confront a character until you defeat him.
On Fridayr rap night, they can all create a unique rhythm through musical notes. What are they waiting for? Come and enjoy cool music together.
